Question
========

A regression analysis examines how the number of credits that students obtain in a year (y) can be predicted from their average graduation grade (x~1~) and their sex (x~2~: x~2~ = 0 for women and x~2~= 1 for men). The regression equation is Å· = 30 + 2x~1~ - 5x~2~. The predicted number of credits for a woman with an average final exam grade equal to 8 is

Solution
